title: Journal of a tour through the Highlands of Scotland during the summer of MDCCCXXIX.
author: Botfield, Beriah
snippet: Milnefield (Milne) crowned alittle eminence on our left, commanding a fineview of the Tay and the woods of Birkhill, enlivening the green hills of Fife, beyond which,rose the hill of Easter Lomond in the distance.
